title: Paw in Paw, Let’s Satisfy Our Desire for Dogs - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Amnesia   Animal Characteristics   Caring Protagonist   Celebrities   Demi-Humans   Divorce   Flashbacks
author: 甜柚茶   精分柚子茶
description:
Seven years ago, when I married the male god, Yin Huaimu, we got blackened till we almost had to quit the entertainment circle.

Seven years later, the world got tipped off about our disagreements because of the ‘Seven Year Itch’, and suspected that we were about to divorce.

After a car accident, both of us entered a coma. When we woke up, my tail was exposed. The secret I’ve kept for many years has been exposed.

Meanwhile, in the bed beside me, my husband actually…I’m shocked!!!>
